assignments.description: Assign variables in the convocation absence branch
assignments.name: Convoc_Absence_Variables_Assignment
assignments.label: Convoc_Absence_Variables_Assignment

assignments.description: If no certif, assign the correct work date resumption
assignments.name: Convoc_NoCertif_Assignment_WorkDate
assignments.label: Convoc_NoCertif_Assignment_WorkDate

assignments.description: If yes, assign the general work date variable
assignments.name: Convoc_YesCertif_Assignment_WorkDate
assignments.label: Convoc_YesCertif_Assignment_WorkDate

assignments.description: Assign variables in the convocation branch
assignments.name: Convocation_Variables_Assignment
assignments.label: Convocation_Variables_Assignment

assignments.description: The control doctor declares that he has attestation in his possession and agrees with the absence. Takes the certificate end date that he inputs
assignments.name: End_Date_absence_End_Date_Certificate
assignments.label: End Date absence = End Date Certificate

assignments.description: If the doctor does not have the certificate, the absence end date is today
assignments.name: End_Date_Absence_End_Date_Today
assignments.label: End Date Absence = End Date Today

assignments.description: Assign the value "cannot be convocated" when the initial work type is "HV without convoc" and the question "Should the employee be convocated" is not visited Can be assigned without decision since on this path, the value will always be "cannot be convocated"
assignments.name: HV_Absence_HV_Without_Convoc_Var_Assignment
assignments.label: HV_Absence_HV_Without_Convoc_Var_Assignment

assignments.description: Assign variables in the home visit absence branch
assignments.name: HV_Absence_Variables_Assignment
assignments.label: HV_Absence_Variables_Assignment

assignments.description: Reassign the status "cannot be completed" to variable
assignments.name: HV_Absent_MustBeConvocated
assignments.label: HV_Absent_MustBeConvocated

assignments.description: Assign variables in the home visit presence branch
assignments.name: HV_Presence_Variables_Assignment
assignments.label: HV_Presence_Variables_Assignment

assignments.description: If no certif, assign the correct work date resumption
assignments.name: HV_Present_NoCertif_Assignment_WorkDate
assignments.label: HV_Present_NoCertif_Assignment_WorkDate

assignments.description: If yes, assign the general work date variable
assignments.name: HV_Present_YesCertif_Assignment_WorkDate
assignments.label: HV_Present_YesCertif_Assignment_WorkDate

assignments.description: Assign false to avoid null value in checkbox
assignments.name: MC_Certificate_False_Value
assignments.label: MC_Certificate_False_Value

choices.description: The doctors accepts the employee absence
choices.name: Acceptation_Absence_Decision

choices.description: The employee is absent but cannot be convocated
choices.name: CannotBeConvocated_Employee_Absence_FollowUP

choices.description: Convocation. Employee Absent but absence is justified
choices.name: Convoc_Employee_Absent_But_Absence_IsJustified

choices.description: Convocation. Employee Absence but absence is not justified
choices.name: Convoc_Employee_Absent_But_Absence_IsNot_Justified
choices.choiceText: No and absence is not justified

choices.description: HV choice. Employee absent but the address was impossible to reach
choices.name: HV_EP_Absent_But_Address_Unreachable
choices.choiceText: The address was impossible to reach

choices.description: HV choice. Employee Absent but wrong address
choices.name: HV_EP_Absent_But_Wrong_Address
choices.choiceText: The wrong address was passed on

choices.description: HV choice. Employee absent but wrong person was passed on
choices.name: HV_EP_Absent_But_Wrong_Person_WasPassedOn
choices.choiceText: The wrong person was passed on

choices.description: Choice for HV value. Yes but the employee did not allow a medical checkup
choices.name: HV_EP_Present_But_DidNot_Allow_MC
choices.choiceText: Yes but the employee did not allow a medical checkup

choices.description: HV employee present choice
choices.name: HV_EP_Present_But_Employee_Family_Friend
choices.choiceText: Yes but the employee is a family, friend

choices.description: HV Employee Present But MC Impossible
choices.name: HV_EP_Present_MC_WasMade_Impossible
choices.choiceText: Yes but the MC was made impossible for me

choices.description: No the employee wasn't present during MC
choices.name: HV_No_Employee_Absent

choices.description: After registrering the employee's absence, the doctor decides to convocate the employee his office
choices.name: MustBeConvocated_Employee_Absence

choices.description: No value
choices.name: No

choices.description: If the certificate was not available at the creation of the absence and the doctor did not get it after either
choices.name: No_Certificate_Doctor_Possession

choices.description: No a prolongation is not possible
choices.name: No_Prolongation_Possible

choices.description: No the treated physician is not convocated during convocation SA
choices.name: No_Treated_Physician_Contacted

choices.description: The doctors refuses the absence of the employee
choices.name: Refusal_Absence_Decision

choices.description: Yes value
choices.name: Yes

choices.description: If the certificate was not available at the creation of the absence, the doctor could get it after and we fill the absence dates
choices.name: Yes_Certificate_Doctor_Possession

choices.description: Yes the employee is present during the medical check
choices.name: Yes_Employee_Present
choices.choiceText: Yes and I was able to do the MC

choices.description: The doctor evaluates that a prolongation is possible
choices.name: Yes_Prolongation_Possible

choices.description: Yes the treated physician is contacted during convocation
choices.name: Yes_Treated_Physician_Contacted

constants.description: Convocation. Employee is absent and absence is justified
constants.name: Cst_Convoc_Employee_Absent_And_Absence_Is_Justified

constants.description: Convocation. Employee is absent and absence is not justified
constants.name: Cst_Convoc_Employee_Absent_And_Absence_IsNot_Justified

constants.description: Constant value for HV employee absent. The address was not reachable
constants.name: Cst_HV_Employee_Absent_But_Address_Unreachable

value.stringValue: No but the address was impossible to reach

constants.description: Constant value for HV choice. Employee Absent but wrong address
constants.name: Cst_Hv_Employee_Absent_Wrong_Address

value.stringValue: No but also the wrong address was passed on

constants.description: Constant value for HV choice. Employee Absent but wrong person was passed on
constants.name: Cst_HV_Employee_Absent_Wrong_Person_WasPassed_On

value.stringValue: No but the wrong person was passed on

constants.description: HV - Employee Present But the employee did not allow a medical checkup
constants.name: Cst_HV_Employee_Present_But_Did_Not_Allow_MC

value.stringValue: Yes but the employee did not allow a medical checkup

constants.description: Constant value for HV choice. Employee Present but is family or friend
constants.name: Cst_HV_Employee_Present_But_Familie_Friend

value.stringValue: Yes but the employee is a familie, friend, ...
Yes but the MC was made impossible for me
7 - Not in accordance for visit date
8 - Early resumption in agreement with attending physician

decisions.description: Decides if the employee must be convocated or cannot be convocated. Necessary for following the flow
decisions.name: Absent_Convocation_Decision
decisions.label: Absent_Convocation_Decision

decisions.description: If the medical_certification_variable_assignment is null, assign false value to avoid error in update
decisions.name: Avoid_Null_Checkbox_Certificate
decisions.label: Avoid_Null_Checkbox_Certificate

decisions.description: Decides of the absence end date
decisions.name: Check_Absence_End_Date
decisions.label: Check_Absence_End_Date

decisions.description: Absence follow up is not filled when : - Employee is family/friend - The wrong address was passed on - The address is unreachable - The wrong person was passed on Picklist field should be left blank
decisions.name: Check_Absence_Follow_Up_was_filled
decisions.label: Check Absence Follow Up was filled

decisions.description: Display adequate template in task description when : Yes but the employee is a family, friend, ... No but also the wrong adress was passed on No but also the adress was impossible to reach No but the wrong person was passed on
decisions.name: Check_if_issue_If_Yes_create_task
decisions.label: Check if issue. If Yes, create task

decisions.description: Decides if the employee must be convocated or cannot be convocated. Necessary for routing the flow
decisions.name: Convoc_Absent_Convocation_Decision
decisions.label: Convoc_Absent_Convocation_Decision

decisions.description: Routes the flow to the relevant path

decisions.description: Check if certificate is true or not. Decides which resumpte date to used
decisions.name: Convoc_WorkDate_Resumption
decisions.label: Convoc_WorkDate_Resumption

decisions.description: If status is cannot be completed, no sending result
decisions.name: Exclude_Must_be_convocated
decisions.label: Exclude Must be convocated

decisions.description: Continue the flow only if the employee is absent and must be convocated
decisions.name: HV_Absence_Convocation_Continue_Flow
decisions.label: HV_Absence_Convocation_Continue_Flow
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: End Flow for convocation & HV_Presence & Hv_Absence_Cannot_Convocated

decisions.description: Check if certificate is true or not. Decides which resumpte date to used
decisions.name: HV_WorkDate_Resumption
decisions.label: HV_WorkDate_Resumption

decisions.description: Decide the result code following doctor's analysis
decisions.name: Resultat_Code_Decision
decisions.label: Resultat_Code_Decision

formulas.description: Caculate the end time of the new convocation when transform from home visit. All the duration in minutes
formulas.name: Cloned_SA_Scheduled_EndTime

formulas.description: Final Date MC (home visit or convocation) for absence update
formulas.name: Date_Time_MC

formulas.description: Doctor Full Name for cloned SA assignment
formulas.name: Doctor_Full_Name

formulas.description: Evaluate the absence status during medical check
formulas.name: Fx_Absence_Status

formulas.description: Evaluate the MC status for customer users display
formulas.name: Fx_Absence_Status_MC

formulas.description: Evaluate examination field value regarding doctor feedback during HV and when employee is present Avoid decision and 3 assignments
formulas.name: Fx_Examination_Value

formulas.description: Assign Patient Available value for HV branch
formulas.name: Fx_HV_PatientAvailable

formulas.description: Text to use in template description depending on doctor feedback: Yes but the employee is a familie, friend, ... => Description = "Patient was present but patient is a familie, friend, ... " No but also the wrong adress was passed on => Description = "Patient was not present, wrong address" No but also the adress was impossible to reach => Description = "Patient was not present, address not accessible" No but the wrong person was passed on => Description = "Patient was not present, wrong patient wrong person was passed on".
formulas.name: Fx_HV_Task_Description
formulas.expression: IF( {!HV_Yes_Employee_Present_Please_specify} = {!HV_EP_Present_But_Employee_Family_Friend}, "Patient was present but is an acquaintance of the doctor " , IF( {!HV_No_Employee_Absent_Please_specify} = {!HV_EP_Absent_But_Wrong_Address}, "Patient was not present, but the wrong address was also passed on" , IF( {!HV_No_Employee_Absent_Please_specify} = {!HV_EP_Absent_But_Address_Unreachable}, "Patient was not present, and the address is not accessible" , IF( {!HV_No_Employee_Absent_Please_specify} = {!Cst_HV_Employee_Absent_Wrong_Person_WasPassed_On}, "Patient was not present, and the wrong person was also passed on" , "" ))))

formulas.description: Check if the absence registration is true or not. Will impact the medical check certificate. If absence certificate is true, display NA
formulas.name: Fx_NA_Medical_Check_Certificate

formulas.description: Display NA when real start date is not filled
formulas.name: Fx_NA_Start_Date

formulas.description: Assign value to the field reason not executed depending on doctor decision
formulas.name: Fx_ReasonNotExecuted

formulas.description: The day after the task is created with additional info for MCM Operator
formulas.name: Fx_Task_Due_Date

Flow.label: Doctor_MC_Conclusion_Analysis
